data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Bobby wears a black t-shirt and jeans to school every day. He ____ the ____ thing ____ the ____ and ____ the ____. He ____ them ____ the ____ school ____ too! I ____ him ____ them. He said, "I like easy clothes."
data.partBlankContent: Bobby wears a black t-shirt and jeans to school every day. He we___ the sa__ thing i_ the sum___ and i_ the win___. He wo__ them t_ the b__ school pa___ too! I as___ him ab___ them. He said, "I like easy clothes."
data.fullContent: Bobby wears a black t-shirt and jeans to school every day. He wears the same thing in the summer and in the winter. He wore them to the boy school party too! I asked him about them. He said, "I like easy clothes."
data.answer: 博比每天穿黑色t恤和牛仔裤去学校。他夏天和冬天都穿一样的衣服。他还穿着它们去参加男生学校的派对!我向他打听了一下。他说:“我喜欢穿简单的衣服。”
